name: Flex LNG Ltd.
description: Flex LNG Ltd. is a leading provider of liquefied natural gas (LNG) shipping services, dedicated to delivering high-performance solutions in the global energy market. Established in 2006 and headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda, Flex LNG focuses on the transportation of LNG through a modern fleet of technologically advanced vessels. The company operates one of the youngest fleets in the LNG sector, comprising several state-of-the-art, dual-fuel, and tri-fuel diesel electric (TFDE) carriers. These vessels are designed to provide greater efficiency, environmental performance, and lower operational costs. Flex LNG plays a pivotal role in the global transition to cleaner energy by facilitating the transportation of LNG, which is regarded as a more environmentally friendly alternative to other fossil fuels. The company's commitment to sustainability extends to its operational practices, which prioritize safety and environmental stewardship. Flex LNG collaborates closely with its customers to meet their specific needs and adapt to the evolving energy landscape. With a strong emphasis on innovation and efficiency, Flex LNG is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for LNG transportation in a world increasingly focused on reducing carbon emissions and transitioning to cleaner energy sources.

key_executives.name: Rolf D. D. M. K. D. T. H. E. J. P. T. R. T. T. H. T. J. T. T.

seo.meta_title: Flex LNG Ltd. | Leading Provider of LNG Shipping Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Flex LNG Ltd., a leading LNG shipping company committed to delivering high-performance transport solutions. Learn about our fleet and commitment to cleaner energy.

faq.question: What does Flex LNG do?
faq.answer: Flex LNG provides liquefied natural gas (LNG) shipping services using a modern fleet of advanced vessels.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Flex LNG?
faq.answer: Ole A. Hjertaker is the CEO of Flex LNG Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Flex LNG headquartered?
faq.answer: Flex LNG is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.
